blueprint_book.label: Rail for Stations
blueprint_book.description:
>>> READ THIS <<<

These stations have connections to TWO POWER POLES on the main train grid, one for narrow and one for wide/quad.  Ignore if they conflict and delete the one that doesn't apply.

Why?  Because it's better to see (and fix) something obviously wrong than to not see something inobviously wrong like forgetting to connect red & green wires from the station to the main train grid.
